title: There was an unexpected error with the login session .Please try again
body: Over the past few days, whenever I got onto the loading screen after logging in. It turns black and says "There was an unexpected error with the login session. Please try again." So I watched a ton of youtube videos on how to fix it, read a ton of boards. I've restarted countless times. I have changed my DNS, but once I change my DNS, it says that it is not responding and cuts my wifi off, even though I'm 100% sure it's the right code. Please someone help!!!

replies.body: Try modifying your firewall level to low. It works for me

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to help you best.
